<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// artifical edges to make dependencies from the FirstSU also dependent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on other chained instructions, and other chained instructions also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dependent on the dependencies of the SecondSU, to prevent them from being</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scheduled into these chained instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
